name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Firewall Engineer with 10+ years of extensive experience in network security, proficient in designing, configuring, and managing secure network infrastructures. Skilled in **Python** and adept at automating network operations using **Ansible**. Expertise in **Firewall Configuration** with hands-on experience in industry-leading technologies such as **Cisco**, **Check Point**, **Palo Alto**, and **Fortinet**. Proven ability to implement security measures, troubleshoot issues, and maintain compliance with regulatory standards.

Additionally, strong background in **Linux** environments and deploying applications using **Docker** and **VMWare**. Familiar with **CI/CD** practices and **DevOps** methodologies to ensure efficient workflows. Passionate about leveraging cutting-edge technologies to optimize and secure network architectures while driving real-world impact.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Implemented network security solutions by deploying **firewall configurations** using **Cisco**, **Check Point**, **Palo Alto**, and **Fortinet**, ensuring secure and robust network operations across **3** critical environments.
•	Leveraged **Python** to automate network security tasks, enhancing efficiency by **40%** through streamlined workflows and improved scripting practices.
•	Designed and enforced network policies, ensuring compliance with security standards across **5** distinct networks, significantly reducing potential vulnerability exposure.
•	Utilized **Docker** and **Ansible** to automate deployment of network security rigs, achieving consistent configurations across all operational units and reducing deployment times by **50%**.
•	Conducted in-depth security assessments and troubleshooting for network issues, reducing incident response times by **60%** through effective log analysis and implementation of preventative measures.
•	Architected and maintained secure network infrastructures using **Linux** environments, leading to improved stability and performance of server resources by **30%**.
•	Managed CI/CD pipelines within **DevOps** frameworks to ensure seamless integrations and updates of network security protocols, enhancing operational reliability and uptime.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate network security measures within **SASE** and **SSE** solutions, ensuring a holistic approach to cloud security and user access management.
•	Developed and maintained comprehensive documentation for network configurations and security protocols while conducting training sessions for **10+** team members, promoting best practices in network security.

Executed **network security** protocols and **firewall configuration** using **Cisco**, **Check Point**, and **Palo Alto** technologies to safeguard financial platform infrastructure.
Designed and implemented **CI/CD** pipelines utilizing **Docker** and **VMWare** to streamline deployment processes across multiple environments, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment time.
Managed **Linux** server environments to enhance system performance and security, leading to a **99.9%** uptime for critical applications.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to establish **SASE** and **SSE** frameworks, enhancing overall network security and compliance.
Automated configuration management with **Ansible**, ensuring consistent setup and security compliance across **9** server clusters.
Conducted regular security audits and vulnerability assessments to mitigate risks, achieving a decrease in security incidents by **30%** year-over-year.
Utilized strong programming skills in **Python** to develop scripts that enhance network monitoring and automate routine security tasks.

Managed and secured network infrastructures focusing on **Network Security** and **Firewall Configuration**, ensuring adherence to best practices and compliance with industry standards across the organization.
Utilized **Python** to automate network monitoring and management tasks, improving efficiency in handling network incidents by **30%** and reducing downtime.
Configured and maintained firewalls using **Cisco**, **Check Point**, **Palo Alto**, and **Fortinet** technologies, effectively protecting the organization against external threats and vulnerabilities.
Orchestrated network security policies and configurations with **Ansible**, ensuring consistency and reducing setup time by **25%** for new deployments.
Implemented secure network architecture incorporating **SASE** and **SSE** principles to seamlessly integrate security into the cloud environment with zero trust in mind.
Streamlined CI/CD processes for network configuration deployments using **Docker** and **VMWare**, improving deployment speed by **40%** while maintaining the reliability of network services.
Conducted regular firewall rule audits and performance assessments, optimizing rulesets to enhance network performance and security posture by **20%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure efficient operations of network infrastructure, contributing to an overall reduction in incident response time by **15%**.
